name: Taken Tag Tournament: Top Tier
description:
In 7 days, the world’s first IRL Taken Tag Tournament will be held. You need a partner, fast. 

After asking around, you find three others who have yet to find a partner themselves:

  • Spag, a famous commentator and influencer. 
  • Fergus, a former competitor and now succesful content creator. 
  • Super Akouma, a talented world-class competitor, some call him the king of Europe.

Will you be able to partner up with one of them? And if so, who will you choose?
